details:
Alin Rad Pop discovered that Samba contained a buffer overflow condition
when processing certain responses received while acting as a client,
leading to arbitrary code execution ([CVE-2008-1105](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2008-1105)).


For the stable distribution (etch), this problem has been fixed in version 
3.0.24-6etch10.


For the unstable distribution (sid), this problem has been fixed in
version 3.0.30-1.


We recommend that you upgrade your samba packages.
